title: Street Team Movement Brings Hope to Homeless
itunes:title: Street Team Movement Brings Hope to Homeless
description:
L’Oréal Paris USA Women of Worth Honoree Briana Daniel, Founder and Executive Director of Street Team Movement, discusses her work aiding the homeless by providing laundry services and critical hygiene items with their hope card initiative.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
